cards.name: Bishop's Prayer
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
Draw 1 card.
Shuffle this card back into your draw pile.

cards.name: Chilled
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Ethereal.
Whenever this card is drawn, lose [E] , then draw 1 card.

cards.name: Cursed Tapestry
cards.description:
Fleeting.
Lose 5 HP.
Deal 30 (50) Damage.
Gain a random Common Relic.

cards.name: Dark Enchantment
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Gain [E] [E].
Increase all numbers that can be increased on cards in hand by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: King's Command
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When you play another card, deal 4 (6) damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Knight's Maneuver
cards.description: Choose: Gain 3 Dexterity and lose 1 Strength, or gain 3 Strength and lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Pawn's Advance
cards.description:
Gain 4 (5) Block.
Deal 4 (5) damage.
This turn, all Pawn's Advances gain 2 (3) bonus damage and Block.

cards.name: Queen's Grace
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Deal 10 damage.
Draw 3 (4) cards.
Gain [E] ( [E]).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rook's Charge
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage.
Repeat for each other Attack in your hand.

cards.name: Slime Elixir
cards.description:
Retain.
Draw 2 (4) cards.
Shuffle a Slimed into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wind Strike
cards.description:
Each Wind Strike increases the damage and block gain by 3 (6).
Choose One - Deal 5 (8) damage and Gain 5 (8) Block or shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile.

cards.name: Wish Granted
cards.description:
* (Retain.)
Wish for the PERFECT Upgraded Rare card to add to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wish for Knowledge
cards.description:
Soulbound.
Autoplay.
Add a copy of a random card that you only have 1 copy of in your deck to it.

cards.name: Greedy
cards.description:
Unplayable. Ethereal.
When drawn, lose 7 Gold.

cards.name: Prick
cards.description:
Retain.
If this card is Exhausted, ALL characters lose 1 HP.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Alphabet Soup
relics.description: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 cards that start with a certain letter to add into your hand. Whenever you play a card that starts with that letter, gain 4 Block and [E] .
relics.flavorText: Letterlicious.

relics.name: Armorer's Headpiece
relics.description: You feel more talkative and start combat with 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Part of the Flock!

relics.name: Bucket Of Slime
relics.description: The first time you play each card in your deck each combat, gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: A bucket of slime! Useful and multipurpose! Huh? What purpose? I'm just a salesman, figure that out yourself.

relics.name: Cardboard Heart
relics.description: When obtained, picks 3 random cards. Choose 1 of 3 of the set to add into your hand with Retain each combat.
relics.flavorText: Slain adventurer's decks form this lump of fibrous board.

relics.name: Cleric's Blessing
relics.description: While in the Battle Tower, at the start of each combat, gain 2 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: That guy sure is friendly.

relics.name: Cultist War Banner
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 Ritual and lose 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Caw? Caw Caw! Caw. caw.

relics.name: Cursed Doll
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, ALL enemies also lose twice that much HP.
relics.flavorText: It's filled with pins and needles . . . and it looks surprisingly like you.

relics.name: Dijinn Lamp
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle a Wish Granted into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: As you rub it, you can feel the faintest echoes of infinite power.

relics.name: Gorgon Head
relics.description: The first time each combat that each enemy intends to attack you multiple times in a turn, it loses 1 temporary Strength.
relics.flavorText: Still dangerous to look at.

relics.name: Hollow Soul
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle a Void into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: You never knew how important it was to you until it was gone.

relics.name: Iron Pot Helmet
relics.description: When you play a Defend, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: It once was special and enchanted. Now it's just a big hunk of metal.

relics.name: Jade Idol
relics.description:
On pick-up add a Wind Strike to your deck.
The first Strike you play each combat is played twice.
relics.flavorText: Immaculately carved, and defying physics just one of these with little effort becomes very powerful given time.

relics.name: Louse War Banner
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 10 Curl Up. When Curl Up is triggered, Block is not lost that turn.
relics.flavorText: Be one with the bug.

relics.name: Lucky
relics.description: At the start of the Boss combat of this Battle Tower, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Those who give back to the less fortunate always find themselves rewarded somehow.

relics.name: Nob War Banner
relics.description: The first 3 enemy actions each combat that are not attacks grant you 1 Strength. Start each combat with 2 Weak.
relics.flavorText: RRrroohrrRGHHhhh!!

relics.name: Otto's Deck
relics.description: Upon pickup, replace your basic Strikes and Defends with Pawn's Advances. Obtain a random Uncommon and Rare Chess Card.
relics.flavorText: Otto's deck is chess themed. Hm.

relics.name: Promise of Gold
relics.description: Gain 100 gold when you defeat the Battle Tower boss.
relics.flavorText: It will all be worth it.

relics.name: Queen's Pawn
relics.description:
If the first and last card you play in a turn is an Attack, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
If the first and last card you play in a turn is a Skill, gain 5 Block.
relics.flavorText: The most important and loyal of pieces.

relics.name: Ruby Fragment
relics.description: Once per combat, after dealing 15 unblocked damage in a combat, gain [E] and draw 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: Just a shard of the Justicar's power, seems offence will be rewarded by his divine.

relics.name: Scary Nail
relics.description: You have 1 additional Strength for every enemy in combat.
relics.flavorText: Taken out of the Totem, this would fit great into a baseball bat.

relics.name: Sentry Core
relics.description: At the start of every odd turn, deal 9 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: An ominous energy still pulses inside, long after removing it.

relics.name: Slime-Filled Flask
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a Slime Elixir to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Is this even safe to drink?

relics.name: Snecko War Banner
relics.description: Start each combat Confused. Draw 3 cards at the start of the first turn of combat.
relics.flavorText: This pattern. It's... mesmerizing.

relics.name: Steelbound Codex
relics.description: Whenever you spend [E] [E] [E] on Attacks in one turn, your next Attack costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Ok Intellij, why do you want to autocorrect "Steelbound" to "Spellbound"?!?

relics.name: Sweaty Armband
relics.description: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: No pain, no gain.

relics.name: Torch
relics.description: While in the Battle Tower, at the start of combat, shuffle 2 copies of your chosen card into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: A simple torch that glows with an emerald fire. It seems to weaken the further it travels.

mods.name: Battle Towers
mods.description: 4th MtS Anniversary Mod! Adds a new node to act 2 that makes you decide between a series of perilous fights with amazing rewards or a chest.
